name: Ricetta: arrosto al miele
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Sticky Honey Roast.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Carota
value.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

value.name: Zucchero
value.desc: Un dolcificante derivato dai Fiordolci. Ha il potere di rallegrare e dare energia.

value.name: Arrosto al miele
value.desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from Jean's Story Quest: Act I "Master's Day Off"</color>
